profile.name: Jordan Harband
profile.headline: @socketdev @tc39 Senior Software Engineer | Hillsborough, CA
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for security and proposal development. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and engaging in discussions about industry trends.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @socketdev @tc39
description: Developed and maintained various utility libraries and tools for development, including form-data/form-data and jsx-eslint/eslint-plugin-react.
Demonstrated expertise in security-related topics such as expressjs/security-wg and nodejs/node.
Engaged in discussions about proposals like tc39/proposal-composites and tc39/proposals.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using JavaScript, including form-data/form-data and jsx-eslint/eslint-plugin-react.
Demonstrated expertise in security-related topics such as expressjs/security-wg and nodejs/node.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and contributed to various open source projects using JavaScript, including form-data/form-data and jsx-eslint/eslint-plugin-react.
Demonstrated expertise in security-related topics such as expressjs/security-wg and nodejs/node.

points: Familiarity with the TC39 proposal process and its various stages.
Understanding of the importance of clear and concise proposal writing in the development of new JavaScript features.
